Articles.Content:
My game crashes halfway through loading.

I'm on windows 10 64-bit running version 1.3.0 on steam.

Here's the link to the log file that ksp generated:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/imkpxlwj87kial6/output_log.txt?dl=0

If someone could help me out that would be great,

Thanks =)
Your game is modded. Moderator move this to modded support pls.
Your mods are not just outdated, they are practically mummified. They were made for the 0.90 release two years ago. Delete all of them.
For getting up to date mods, use CKAN or read the mod release thread.
I know the problem. Try loading the 1.2.2 stock assets to the 1.3 install. Loading the wrong asset will make the game crash.
This is indeed a modded install. Your best bet is to find the latest versions of all of your mods. KSP v1.3 broke quite a lot of them, and mods made for v0.90 will almost certainly not work.
